title: How long will it be until iPhone 12 comes out? - Quora

response.answer_text: Apple usually launches its new series of iPhones in their annual September press meet every year. The same was expected this year as well but because of the ongoing situations, it is not confirmed if the launch will happen as planned. According to reports, however, the iPhone 12 is slated to be launched and released in October and the pro versions of the 12 series in November. It is however certain that the launch will be later than usual and consumers will most probably get their hands on the new phones only by November. It seems unlikely considering recent situations that it is going to be sooner than that although the pre-orders might open up in October.  The iPhone 12 is being waited on excitedly by the users because it is slated to be integrated with pretty decent features. Apple usually never fails to impress with its camera performance and the same is expected from the new series as well. It is also being rumored that iPhone 12 will be integrated with the upcoming Apple A14 bionic processor, although there are conflicting reports stating that the new processor will be included only with the pro versions. We will have to wait and see regarding this aspect as there has been no confirmation from the brand on this part, but personally I want the entire series to be powered by this processor. Apple A14 Bionic will be the absolute highlight in this smartphone and honestly for good reasons. Its predecessor - the A13 is considered as one of the best smartphone processors and the A14 will be its upgraded version with a likely core speed of 3.1GHz. Moreover, it will also be 5G powered which will make this series pretty strong in all aspects. I am definitely looking forward to seeing the new Apple offerings in action.

The iPhone motherboard will be produced in two batches, with the two new 6.1-inch iPhones (presumably the iPhone 12 6.1-inch and iPhone 12 Pro 6.1-inch) being delivered first, and production has already begun in July, according to sources in the supply chain responsible for the motherboard's production. The 6.7-inch and 5.4-inch motherboards will start production in late August.  The 6.7-inch and 5.4-inch motherboards will start production in late August. There are 4 new iPhone models expected to be released this year, and all the screens are expected to use OLED, but the Pro version will have higher specifications, and have ProMotion function. 4 iPhone models also support 5G, but only the iPhone 12 Pro Max can support mmWave 5G standard, and only the U.S., Japan, and the United States. The launch date is expected to be October at the earliest, with the iPhone 12 Pro Max most likely to be released in November. As for the launch date, it's expected to be October at the earliest, with the iPhone 12 Pro Max most likely to be released in November.
